I just had the same error happen.  Also Win2k.  I was deleting three projects 
from the packages view: one plug-in project and two fragment projects.  I tried 
in vain to reproduce it.  I activated the deletion with the "Del" key, and I 
choose to delete contents when prompted.  My stack trace is similar but not 
identical, so I will create a separate attachment.

Created an attachment (id=269)
Log file showing NPE stack trace

Could not reproduce it either. The stack traces are useless since the real NPE 
was wrapped by SWT and was not printed. Workbench.handleExceptionInEventLoop 
has being changed to print SWT nested exception.

Please reopen this PR with the NPE stack trace if/when it happens again.
